text: Champapuri, Champa Nagri or Champanagar is a neighbourhood in Bhagalpur in the Indian state of Bihar. It is the site of the ancient city of Champa, the capital of the Anga Mahajanapada. It is also the main centre of capital of cultural region of Anga. Category:Coordinates on Wikidata Category:Pages using gadget WikiMiniAtlas Category:Neighborhoods
title: Champapuri
